TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Timeline extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable
Public MustInherit Class Timeline Inherits Animatable

summary.span: 定義一段時間。

span.span: Defines a segment of time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時間軸代表一段時間。A timeline represents a segment of time. 它提供的屬性可讓您指定時間片段長度、應開始的時間、重複次數、時間在該片段中的播放速度等等。It provides properties that enable you to specify the length of that segment, when it should start, how many times it will repeat, how fast time progresses in that segment, and more. 從時間軸類別繼承的類別提供額外功能，例如，動畫和媒體播放。Classes that inherit from the timeline class provide additional functionality, such as animation and media playback. 以下是一些可用的特定時間軸的不同類型的範例。The following are examples of some of the different types of specialized timelines available. - **動畫**:是一種時間軸會產生輸出值。**Animations**: An is a type of timeline that produces output values. 當您關聯屬性的動畫時，動畫播放，藉此 「 動畫"，就會更新屬性的值。When you associate an animation with a property, the animation updates the property's value as it plays, thereby "animating" it. 動畫的簡介，請參閱[動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md)。For an introduction to animations, see [Animation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md). 將動畫套用不同的方式的相關資訊，請參閱[屬性動畫技術概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/property-animation-techniques-overview.md)。For information about the different ways to apply animations, see the [Property Animation Techniques Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/property-animation-techniques-overview.md). - **MediaTimelines**: A是一種控制播放的媒體檔案的時間軸。**MediaTimelines**: A is a type of timeline that controls the playback of a media file. - **ParallelTimelines**: A是分組其他砸下大筆花費的時間軸的類型。**ParallelTimelines**: A is a type of timeline that groups other timelines. - **分鏡腳本**: A是一種特殊型別的，提供物件和屬性的鎖定時間軸它所包含的資訊。**Storyboards**: A is a special type of that provides object and property targeting information for the timelines it contains. 如需有關物件，請參閱[概觀腳本](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。For more information about objects, see the [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). 如需使用時間軸的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md)。For more information about using timelines, see the [Animation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md). 計時功能時間軸的簡介，請參閱[計時行為概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-behaviors-overview.md)。For an introduction to the timing features of timelines, see the [Timing Behaviors Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-behaviors-overview.md). ## 資料繫結和動畫時間軸Data Binding and Animating Timelines 大部分的時間軸屬性可以是資料繫結或以動畫顯示。不過，由於計時系統的運作的方式，繫結或動畫時間軸行為不像其他資料的資料繫結，或建立動畫的物件。Most timeline properties can be data bound or animated; however, because of the way the timing system works, data bound or animated timelines do not behave like other data bound or animated objects. 若要了解其行為，它有助於了解啟用時間軸的意義。To understand their behavior, it helps to understand what it means to activate a timeline. 套用時間軸時，會在時間軸和子時刻表製作複本。When a timeline is applied, copies are made of the timeline and its child timelines. 這些複本會凍結 （對唯讀） 和從中建立物件。These copies are frozen (made read-only) and objects are created from them. 這些執行動畫目標的屬性的實際工作的時鐘它。It's these clocks that do the actual work of animating the targeted properties. 如果時間表是資料繫結，或有動畫效果，其目前值的快照集已建立時鐘的時間。If a timeline was data bound or animated, a snapshot of its current values was made when its clock was created. 即使原始時間軸可能繼續變更，其時鐘卻不符合。Even though the original timeline might continue to change, its clock does not. 時間軸以反映資料繫結或動畫變更，必須重新產生它的時鐘。For a timeline to reflect data binding or animation changes, its clock must be regenerated. 時鐘不會自動產生。Clocks are not regenerated for you automatically. 以下是幾種可套用時間軸變更的方式︰The following are several ways to apply timeline changes: - 如果時間表是或屬於，您可以將它重新套用其分鏡腳本使用反映變更或方法。If the timeline is or belongs to a , you can make it reflect changes by reapplying its storyboard using a or the method. 這也會一併重新啟動動畫。This has the side effect of also restarting the animation. 在程式碼中，您可以使用前進分鏡腳本方法回它先前的位置。In code, you can use the method to advance the storyboard back to its previous position. - 如果您動畫直接套用到屬性，使用方法，請呼叫方法一次，並將它傳遞已修改的動畫。If you applied an animation directly to a property using the method, call the method again and pass it the animation that's been modified. - 如果您直接在時鐘層級運作，請建立並套用一組新的時鐘，並使用它們來取代前一組產生的時鐘。If you are working directly at the clock level, create and apply a new set of clocks and use them to replace the previous set of generated clocks. 如範例的資料繫結動畫，請參閱 < [ 金鑰曲線動畫範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。For an example of a data bound animation, see the [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) . ## 使用時間表，做為計時器Using a Timeline as a Timer 與其相關聯的事件處理常式時，時間軸的時鐘會只進度或 (如果是物件) 相關聯的屬性。A timeline's clock will only progress when there's an event hander associated with it or (in the case of an object) it is associated with a property. 因此 （和其他項目），不建議您改用做為計時器。For this reason (and others), it's not recommended that you use a as a timer.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double AccelerationRatio { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定時刻表的 將時間從零加速至其最大速率所花費的百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying the percentage of the timeline's spent accelerating the passage of time from zero to its maximum rate.

value.span: 介於 0 到 1 (含) 的值，這個值指定時刻表的 將時間從零加速至其最大速率所花費的百分比。

span.span: A value between 0 and 1, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of the timeline's spent accelerating the passage of time from zero to its maximum rate.

value.span: 如果時間軸 屬性也已設定，則 和 總和必須小於或等於 1。

span.span: If the timeline's property is also set, the sum of and must be less than or equal to 1.

value.span: 預設值為 0。

span.span: The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，建立啟動緩慢，並隨著時間過去然後加快的動畫。Use the property to create animations that start slowly and then speed up as time progresses. 屬性可用於建立緩效果或進行看起來更自然的移動。The property is useful for creating ease-in effects or making movement seem more natural. 使用和一起以建立動畫的速度緩慢，開頭的屬性加速，並完成前一次會降低。Use the and properties together to create animations that that start slowly, speed up, and then slow down again before finishing. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than 1.
The sum of and exceeds 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法，且不應直接由您的程式碼呼叫。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly by your code.

span.para: 實作器時應該使用類別的對應自訂時鐘應該覆寫這個方法。覆寫的方法應該建立並傳回繼承自類別的新執行個體。

Implementers of should override this method when it has a corresponding custom clock that should be used with the class. The overridden method should create and return a new instance of class that inherits from .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoReverse { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoReverse : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，其中該值指出時間軸是否會在完成向前反覆項目後反向播放。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the timeline plays in reverse after it completes a forward iteration.

value.span: 如果時刻表在每個反覆項目結尾以反向順序播放則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the timeline plays in reverse at the end of each iteration; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`，兩次指定的時間長度的時間軸播放其屬性。If the property is set to `true`, the timeline plays for twice the length of time specified by its property. ### 包含 AutoReverse 和重複次數AutoReverse and Repetitions 當 時間軸的屬性設定為`true`及其屬性造成動畫重複，每個向前反覆項目後面接著回溯的反覆項目。When a timeline's property is set to `true` and its property causes it to repeat, each forward iteration is followed by a backward iteration. 這可讓重複一次。This makes one repetition. 比方說，使用時間軸值`true`反覆項目與為 2 會播放轉送一次，則回溯，一次，然後轉送，然後向後一次。For example, a timeline with an value of `true` with an iteration of 2 would play forward once, then backwards, then forwards again, and then backwards again. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

Public Shared ReadOnly AutoReverseProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property BeginTime As Nullable(Of TimeSpan)
public: property Nullable<TimeSpan> BeginTime { Nullable<TimeSpan> get(); void set(Nullable<TimeSpan> value); };
member this.BeginTime : Nullable<TimeSpan> with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 應開始的時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the time at which this should begin.

value.span: 這個 應開始的時間，相對於其父代的 。

span.span: The time at which this should begin, relative to its parent's .

value.span: 如果這個時間表是根時間表，則時間相對於其互動開始時間 (觸發時間表的時間)。

span.span: If this timeline is a root timeline, the time is relative to its interactive begin time (the moment at which the timeline was triggered).

value.span: 這個值可能是正值、負值或 ，其中 值表示時刻表永遠不會播放。

span.span: This value may be positive, negative, or ; a value means the timeline never plays.

value.span: 預設值是零。

span.span: The default value is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可用於建立序列中播放的時間軸： 藉由增加共用相同的父系的連續時間軸，您可以交錯它們播放的時間。The property is useful for creating timelines that play in a sequence: by increasing the of successive timelines that share the same parent, you can stagger their play times. ## 負數值Negative Values 負值原因的行為就像是在過去的時間啟動。A negative value causes a to behave as though it started at some time in the past. 比方說，與的負 2.5 秒和5 秒將會出現半方法完成時啟動。For example, a with a of negative 2.5 seconds and a of 5 seconds will appear to be half-way finished when it starts. ## BeginTime 和 SpeedRatioBeginTime and SpeedRatio 所描述的時間屬性以時間軸的父時間單位。The time described by the property is measured in the timeline's parent's time. 例如，使用時間軸其父代具有的 5 個2 的實際開始 2.5 秒之後。For example, a timeline with a of 5 whose parent has a of 2 actually starts after 2.5 seconds. 時間軸的自己設定不會影響其。A timeline's own setting does not affect its . 比方說，使用時間軸5 秒， 2 及父時間軸與的 1 開始之後 5 秒，而不是 2.5。For example, a timeline with a of 5 seconds, a of 2, and a parent timeline with a of 1 starts after 5 seconds, not 2.5. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*物件* ="[-] [*天*。]*小時*:*分鐘*:*秒*[。*fractionalSeconds*]"/ >\<*object* ="[-][*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/> \-或-\- or - \<*物件* ="[-] [*天*。]*小時*:*分鐘*"/ >\<*object* ="[-][*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*"/> \-或-\- or - \<*object* ="[-]*days*"/>\<*object* ="[-]*days*"/> \-或-\- or - \<*物件* ="{[X:null 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ >\<*object* ="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/> ## XAML 值XAML Values 方括號中的項目 (`[`和`]`) 是選擇性的。Items in square brackets (`[` and `]`) are optional. *天**days* 大於或等於 0，描述由此跨裝置填滿的日數的值開始時間。A value greater than or equal to 0 that describes the number of days spanned by this begin time. *小時**hours* 表示由此跨裝置填滿的時數的值介於 0 到 23 之間開始時間。A value between 0 and 23 that represents the number of hours spanned by this begin time. *分鐘**minutes* 表示由此跨裝置填滿的分鐘數的值介於 0 到 59 之間開始時間。A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of minutes spanned by this begin time. *秒數**seconds* 表示由此跨裝置填滿的秒數的值介於 0 到 59 之間開始時間。A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of seconds spanned by this begin time. *fractionalSeconds**fractionalSeconds* 值包含 1 到 7 位數字，代表小數秒數。A value consisting of 1 to 7 digits that represents fractional seconds. 針對完整語法，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節的頁面。For the complete syntax, see the Remarks section of the page. ## Examples 時間軸的屬性會決定時間軸的作用期間的開頭。A timeline's property determines the beginning of a timeline's active period. 如果時間表具有父時間軸屬性會決定耗費時間軸在其父代啟動之後開始的時間。If the timeline has a parent timeline, the property determines how long it takes the timeline to start after its parent starts. 如果時間表是根時間表 ( ，例如)、屬性會決定多久時間軸會開始播放之後觸發。If the timeline is a root timeline (a , for example), the property determines how long the timeline takes to start playing after it is triggered. 下列範例示範數個不同的時間軸具有不同設定。The following example shows several different timelines with different settings. [!code-xaml[timingbehaviors_snip#_graphicsmm_BeginTimeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_snip/CSharp/BeginTimeExample.xaml#_graphicsmm_begintimeexamplewholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Completed As EventHandler

summary.span: 當這個時刻表完全結束播放時會發生：它不會再進入其作用期。

span.span: Occurs when this timeline has completely finished playing: it will no longer enter its active period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個時間表是根時間表的時間軸的樹狀結構，它已完成播放 （其中包含重複） 作用期結束及所有子系已達到其作用中期間結束之後。If this timeline is the root timeline of a timeline tree, it has completed playing after it reaches the end of its active period (which includes repeats) and all its children have reached the end of their active periods. 如果這個時間表是子時刻表，認定為完全結束播放時所屬到達時間表樹狀結構的根時間表作用期和所有子時刻表的結尾已完成播放。If this timeline is a child timeline, it is considered to have completely finished playing when the root timeline of the timeline tree to which it belongs reaches the end of its active period and all its child timelines have finished playing. 停止時間軸不會觸發已完成的事件，但略過它到其填滿期間。Stopping a timeline does not trigger its completed event, but skipping it to its fill period does. 參數事件處理常式是時間軸的。The parameter of the event handler is the timeline's . 雖然這個事件處理常式似乎是相關聯時間軸，但它實際上會向註冊建立這個時間軸。Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the created for this timeline. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[計時事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md). ## Examples 在下列範例中，兩個物件可用來建立動畫之間轉換兩個映像，使用儲存物件，並使用顯示控制項。In the following example, two objects are used to create an animation transition between two images, stored using objects and displayed using an control. 一個分鏡腳本壓縮影像控制項，直到消失為止。One storyboard shrinks the image control until it disappears. 在完成舊之後交換與其他，並展開影像的第二個分鏡腳本控制全尺寸再度之前。After it completes, the old is swapped with the other , and a second storyboard that expands the image control until it is full-sized again. [!code-xaml[timingbehaviors_snip#TimelineCompletedExampleMarkupUsingWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_snip/CSharp/TimelineCompletedExample.xaml#timelinecompletedexamplemarkupusingwholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於時刻表時鐘的時間進行速率變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the rate at which time progresses for the timeline's clock changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下列情況下的時間軸的時鐘變更目前全域速度：The current global speed of a timeline's clock changes in the following circumstances: - 時鐘變更方向，因為它的時間軸設定。The clock changes direction because of its timeline's setting. - 時鐘加速或減速由於其時間表或屬性設定。The clock accelerates or decelerates because of its timeline's or property settings. - 時鐘連接而暫停或繼續。The clock is paused or resumed. - 時鐘變成非使用中，或重新啟動。The clock becomes inactive or reactivates. - 的一種時鐘的父代的變更。The of one of the clock's parent changes. 事件很實用追蹤時間軸的時鐘會變成暫停時，在您的事件處理常式，請使用您的分鏡腳本方法或時鐘核取屬性來判斷是否要暫停其時鐘; 這對比較若要判斷是否已變更先前快取的值。The event is useful for tracking when a timeline's clock becomes paused; in your event handler, use your storyboard's method or check the clock's property to determine whether its clock is paused; compare this against a previously cached value to determine whether it changed. 參數事件處理常式是時間軸的。The parameter of the event handler is the timeline's . 雖然這個事件處理常式似乎是相關聯時間軸，但它實際上會向註冊建立這個時間軸。Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the created for this timeline. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[計時事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何註冊事件。The following example shows how to register for the event. [!code-csharp[timingbehaviors_procedural_snip#TimelineCurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidatedExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_procedural_snip/CSharp/TimelineCurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidatedExample.cs#timelinecurrentglobalspeedinvalidatedexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[timingbehaviors_procedural_snip#TimelineCurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidatedExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_procedural_snip/visualbasic/timelinecurrentglobalspeedinvalidatedexample.vb#timelinecurrentglobalspeedinvalidatedexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentStateInvalidated As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於時刻表之 的 屬性更新時。

span.span: Occurs when the property of the timeline's is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用事件，當您想要在時間軸時收到通知啟動、 停止或填滿。Use the event when you want to be notified when a timeline's starts, stops, or fills. 暫停不會變更其。Pausing a does not change its . 若要收到通知的時鐘會變成暫停時，要使用事件。To be notified when a clock becomes paused, use the event. 雖然此事件發生時會變成無效，不一定表示變更：切換從來然後再設回在相同刻度將會引發此事件引發，但其屬性實際上不會變更。Although this event occurs when the becomes invalid, that doesn't necessarily mean the changed: a that switches from to and then back to in the same tick will cause this event to fire, but its property won't actually change. 參數事件處理常式是所建立的這個時間軸。The parameter of the event handler is the that was created for this timeline. 雖然這個事件處理常式似乎是相關聯時間軸，但它實際上會向註冊建立這個時間軸。Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the created for this timeline. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[計時事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CurrentTimeInvalidated As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於時刻表之 的 屬性更新時。

span.span: Occurs when the property of the timeline's is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用事件，當您想要收到通知時以時間表的會更新。Use the event when you want to be notified when the of a timeline's is updated. 參數事件處理常式是時間軸的。The parameter of the event handler is the timeline's . 雖然這個事件處理常式似乎是相關聯時間軸，但它實際上會向註冊建立這個時間軸。Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the created for this timeline. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[計時事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何註冊事件。The following example shows how to register for the event. value.span: 預設值為 0。

span.span: The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來建立動畫的速度很慢關閉之前停止。Use the property to create animations that slow down before stopping. 屬性可用於建立緩效果或進行看起來更自然的移動。The property is useful for creating ease-in effects or making movement seem more natural. 使用和一起以建立動畫的速度緩慢，開頭的屬性加速，並完成前一次會降低。Use the and properties together to create animations that that start slowly, speed up, and then slow down again before finishing. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

The sum of and exceeds 1.

summary.span: 取得或設定這個時間表播放的時間長度 (不計算重複次數)。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time for which this timeline plays, not counting repetitions.

value.span: 時刻表的簡單持續期間：這個時刻表完成單一向前反覆項目所花費的時間量。

span.span: The timeline's simple duration: the amount of time this timeline takes to complete a single forward iteration.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 時間軸的簡單的持續時間會構成的時間與總播放時間，其中包含重複的單一向前反覆項目。A timeline's simple duration constitutes the time for a single forward iteration versus the total play time, which includes repetitions. ## 預設的持續時間行為Default Duration Behavior 行為值是結構取決於時間軸的類型：The behavior of a structure with a value of depends on the type of timeline: |**時間軸****Timeline**|**行為****Behavior**| |-|-| ||不明 (是抽象)Undetermined ( is abstract)| |,,

,,

|會展開，以符合子時刻表Expands to fit child timelines| |\<*型別*> 動畫 （亦即 「 從/至/者 」 或 「 基本 」 的動畫）\<*Type*>Animation (Known as a "From/To/By" or "basic" animations)|1 秒1 second| |\<*型別*> AnimationUsingKeyFrames （亦即主要畫面格動畫）\<*Type*>AnimationUsingKeyFrames (Known as key frame animations)|所有的主要畫面格的加總值Sum of all key frame values| ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 和種物件。 and are types of objects. 持續時間取決於其子時刻表的持續時間。The duration of a is determined by the duration of its child timelines. 例如，以下會執行六秒 （持續時間的 6 秒），所以，當最後一個子時刻表 () 結束。For example, the below will run for six seconds (duration of 6 seconds) because that is when its last child Timeline () ends. > [!NOTE] > 注意： 從下列的範例中，為說明之用僅提供省略的程式碼。Note: code has been omitted from the following examples, which are provided for illustrative purposed only. [xaml][xaml] ``` ... ... ``` 範例\<*類型*> 動畫包含， ，等等。如果沒有指定這些類型的動畫，它們會執行一秒。Examples of \<*Type*>Animations include , , , etc. If no is specified for these types of animations, they will run for one second. [xaml][xaml] ``` ... ... ``` 範例\<*類型*> AnimationUsingKeyFrames 包含，等等。如果沒有指定這些類型的它們將會執行直到完成所有的主要畫面格的動畫。Examples of \<*Type*>AnimationUsingKeyFrames include , , etc. If no is specified for these types of animations they will run until all key frames are finished. [xaml][xaml] ``` ... ... ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Animation::FillBehavior FillBehavior { System::Windows::Media::Animation::FillBehavior get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Animation::FillBehavior value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定 在其作用期結束之後的運作方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the behaves after it reaches the end of its active period.

value.span: 一個值，指定時間軸在作用期結束後，但它的父系是在作用或填滿期間內時的行為。

span.span: A value that specifies how the timeline behaves after it reaches the end of its active period but its parent is inside its active or fill period.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定動畫屬性當您想保留其值，其作用期結束後動畫。Set an animations property to when you want the animation to hold its value after it reaches the end of its active period. 已達到其作用期結束之動畫的設定即為其填滿期間。An animation that has reached the end of its active period that has a setting of is said to be in its fill period. 當您不想保留之後其值的動畫達到作用期結束，請將其When you don't want an animation to hold its value after it reaches the end of its active period, set its 屬性為。 property to . 在填滿期間動畫持續覆寫其目標屬性的值，因為嘗試將目標屬性的值，透過其他方式設定可能會不有任何作用。Because an animation in its fill period continues to override its target property's value, attempting to set the target property's value through other means might appear to have no effect. 如需顯示如何設定之後已經建立動畫的屬性值的範例，請參閱[How to： 設定屬性之後建立的動畫它使用分鏡腳本](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-set-a-property-after-animating-it-with-a-storyboard.md)。For an example showing how to set a property value after it has been animated, see [How to: Set a Property After Animating It with a Storyboard](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-set-a-property-after-animating-it-with-a-storyboard.md). 子時刻表會停止播放，並填滿時就會停止其父時間軸。如果您想子時刻表來填滿，請確定其父時間軸具有的。A child timeline stops playing and filling when its parent timeline stops; if you want a child timeline to fill, make sure its parent timeline has a of . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

Protected Overrides Function FreezeCore (isChecking As Boolean) As Boolean

param.name: isChecking
param.span: 會檢查是否可以凍結這個執行個體，而 則會凍結這個執行個體。

span.span: to check if this instance can be frozen; to freeze this instance.

summary.span: 使這個 成為不可修改，或決定它是否可以變成不可修改。

span.span: Makes this unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable.

returns.span: 當 為 true 時，如果這個執行個體可以變成唯讀狀態，則這個方法會傳回 ，否則為 。

span.span: If is true, this method returns if this instance can be made read-only, or if it cannot be made read-only.

returns.span: 當 為 false 時，如果這個執行個體現在已經是唯讀狀態時，則這個方法會傳回 ，如果這個執行個體不可以成為唯讀狀態，則會傳回 ，而副作用是會開始變更這個物件的凍結狀態。

span.span: If is false, this method returns if this instance is now read-only, or if it cannot be made read-only, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿呼叫這個方法，直接 （只是呼叫基底實作中）。Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation). 這個方法在內部呼叫。This method is called internally by .

span.para: 類別包含不會儲存使用相依性屬性的資料時，實作者必須覆寫這個方法。一般的實作會呼叫基底，然後可以呼叫靜態方法上所有型別的屬性，其中包含類別，傳回只有當所有屬性凍結 （或可能有已凍結，在傳遞的情況下透過值)。

implementers must override this method when the class contains data that is not stored using dependency properties. A typical implementation would call base, then call the static method on all typed properties that the class contains, returning only if all properties were frozen (or could have been frozen, in the case of passing through a value for ).

summary.span: 將這個執行個體製作為所指定 物件的複製品。

span.span: Makes this instance a clone of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values. 請注意，如果這些屬性包含資源的參考或資料繫結失敗時嘗試凍結物件，並將擲回。Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an . 這個方法會呼叫方法並不應該呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了當呼叫時覆寫這個方法的基底實作。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要建立目前物件的凍結的複本，請呼叫而不是直接呼叫這個方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

span.span: Makes this instance a frozen clone of the specified .

summary.span: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

span.span: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法只能呼叫時屬性設定為。This method should only be called when the property is set to . 如果是，自然持續期間由該特定類別的實作。If is , the natural duration is determined by that particular class's implementation of . 如果傳回，則代表自然持續期間是不明，表示自然持續時間為。If returns , it means that the natural duration is unknown, which implies a natural duration of . 就是這種串流處理媒體的情況。Such is the case for streaming media. 請注意，這個時間軸的時鐘不建立一個傳遞此方法，但會提供不可靠的結果。Note that passing this method a clock other than the one that was created for this timeline is possible, but will provide unreliable results.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RemoveRequested As EventHandler

summary.span: 為這個時刻表建立時鐘或移除它的其中一個父時刻表時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the clock created for this timeline or one of its parent timelines is removed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由套用引發這個事件動作使用分鏡腳本的分鏡腳本方法，或 （當直接使用時鐘） 呼叫方法。This event is raised by applying a action to a storyboard, using a Storyboard's method, or (when working directly with clocks) calling the method. 雖然這個事件處理常式似乎是相關聯時間軸，但它實際上會向註冊建立這個時間軸。Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the created for this timeline. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[計時事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md)。For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/timing-events-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Animation::RepeatBehavior RepeatBehavior { System::Windows::Media::Animation::RepeatBehavior get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Animation::RepeatBehavior value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個時間軸的重複行為。

span.span: Gets or sets the repeating behavior of this timeline.

value.span: 指定時刻表應播放次數的反覆 、指定這個時刻表之作用期總長度的 值，或是指定時刻表應無限次重複的特殊值 。

span.span: An iteration that specifies the number of times the timeline should play, a value that specifies the total the length of this timeline's active period, or the special value , which specifies that the timeline should repeat indefinitely.

value.span: 預設值是與的1，指出時間軸播放一次。

span.span: The default value is a with a of 1, which indicates that the timeline plays once.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果反覆項目指定與時間軸的屬性設定為`true`，單一重複組成一個向前反覆項目和一個回溯的反覆項目。If an iteration is specified and the timeline's property is set to `true`, a single repetition consists of one forward iteration and one backward iteration. 將時間表與屬性設為 true 反覆項目為 2 會播放轉寄，則回溯，一次，然後轉送，然後向後一次。A timeline with an property set to true an iteration of 2 would play forwards, then backwards, then forwards again, and then backwards again. 您也可以指定您想要播放的時間軸的時間的總長度，而非指定的時間軸播放的次數。Instead of specifying the number of times a timeline plays, you can also specify the total length of time you want the timeline to play. 若要重複，這時刻表的值應該大於時間軸的。For a timeline to repeat, this value should be greater than the timeline's . 例如，使用時間軸2 秒的和4 秒的播放兩次。For example, a timeline with a of 2 seconds and a of 4 seconds will play twice. 如果小於時間軸的，時間軸的作用期間縮短。If the is less than the timeline's , the timeline's active period is cut short. 如需重複時間表的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md)。For more information about repeating timelines, see [Animation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-overview.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double SpeedRatio { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.SpeedRatio : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 相對於其父代的時間進行比率。

span.span: Gets or sets the rate, relative to its parent, at which time progresses for this .

value.span: 一個大於 0 的有限值，說明這個時刻表相對於其父代之速度的時間進行比率，而如果這是根時刻表，則為預設時刻表速度。

span.span: A finite value greater than 0 that describes the rate at which time progresses for this timeline, relative to the speed of the timeline's parent or, if this is a root timeline, the default timeline speed.

value.span: 預設值為 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時間軸的設定沒有影響其; 該時間是相對於其父代，或如果時間表是根時間表，的目前的開始時間軸的時鐘。A timeline's setting does not have an effect on its ; that time is relative to the timeline's parent or, if the timeline is a root timeline, the moment at which the timeline's clock was begun. 如果或都有指定，這透過時間軸的自然的長度是平均的比例。If or are specified, this is the average ratio over the natural length of the timeline. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 時間軸的屬性會控制其進度，相對於其父代的速率。A timeline's property controls its rate of progress, relative to its parent. 如果時間表是根，其相對於預設的時間表速度。If the timeline is a root, its is relative to the default timeline speed. 下列範例示範數個不同的時間軸設定。The following example shows several timelines with different settings. [!code-xaml[timingbehaviors_snip#_graphicsmm_SpeedExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_snip/CSharp/SpeedExample.xaml#_graphicsmm_speedexamplewholepage)]

exception.span: 小於 0 或不是有限值。

span.span: is less than 0 or is not a finite value.
